page.title: 18 A DAY OF AN 8 YEAR OLD
page.content: In the morning I get up at 6.30.I am woken up by my father as I have't got an alarm clock.I am downstairs by 7.45 and I pack my lunch box.Then I have my breakfast.I have toast and hot chocolate. Then I feed my rabbit.I then put my coat on and travel to school by car.I am usually at school early.When I am working I like to talk a bit.My favourite work on Friday is Fletcher( a maths scheme).After that I go out to play after which Mrs Farr reads me a story.Then we go home.At home sometimes Ihave a friend to play or I go out to play. I go to bed at 8.30pm.When I have changed into my pyjamas mummy reads us a story.Sometimes before that we have a bath. Kate aged 8
